input: Generate a word cloud for the MODEL Group description "BOLERO" based on data from 01-Jan-2024 to 31-Mar-2024.
query: SELECT mm.[MODL_GROP_DESC] AS [Model_Grop], cv.[verbatim_group], cv.[verbatim_code], cv.[cust_verbtm_desc], cv.[verbatim_group_desc], cv.[demanded_verbatim], COUNT(cv.[verbatim_code]) AS [frequency_count] FROM MH_CUST_VERBATIM cv JOIN MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS rhd ON cv.[sv_ro_hdr_sk] = rhd.[sv_ro_hdr_sk] JOIN MH_MODEL_MASTER mm ON rhd.[MODL_CD] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = mm.[MODL_CD] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS WHERE mm.[MODL_GROP_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'BOLERO' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND rhd.[RO_BILL_DATE] BETWEEN DATE '2024-01-01' AND DATE '2024-03-31' AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%schedule%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%washing%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%maxicare%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%wheel alignment%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%wheel balance%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%service action%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%10000%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%1000%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%5000%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%km%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS GROUP BY mm.[MODL_GROP_DESC], cv.[verbatim_group], cv.[verbatim_code], cv.[cust_verbtm_desc], cv.[verbatim_group_desc], cv.[demanded_verbatim] ORDER BY [frequency_count] DESC;

input: Generate a Word Cloud for the FAMLY_DESC "XUV700 Diesel AT".
query: SELECT mm.[MODL_GROP_DESC] AS [Model_Grop], cv.[verbatim_group], cv.[verbatim_code], cv.[cust_verbtm_desc], cv.[verbatim_group_desc], cv.[demanded_verbatim], COUNT(cv.[verbatim_code]) AS [frequency_count] FROM MH_CUST_VERBATIM cv JOIN MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS rhd ON cv.[sv_ro_hdr_sk] = rhd.[sv_ro_hdr_sk] JOIN MH_MODEL_MASTER mm ON rhd.[MODL_CD] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = mm.[MODL_CD] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS WHERE mm.[FAMLY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'XUV700 Diesel AT' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND ((rhd.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('free service', 'paid service', 'en-route repair', 'repair') AND rhd.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'mechanical' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS) OR (rhd.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'bodyshop' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND rhd.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'accessories' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS) OR (rhd.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'bodyshop' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND rhd.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'bodyshop' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS) OR (rhd.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'sales & service' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND rhd.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'accessories' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS) OR (rhd.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'bodyshop' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND rhd.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'pre-sale/pdi' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS)) AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%schedule%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%washing%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%maxicare%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%wheel alignment%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%wheel balance%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%service action%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%10000%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%1000%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%5000%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%km%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS GROUP BY mm.[MODL_GROP_DESC], cv.[verbatim_group], cv.[verbatim_code], cv.[cust_verbtm_desc], cv.[verbatim_group_desc], cv.[demanded_verbatim] ORDER BY [frequency_count] DESC;

input: Generate a Word Cloud for the Dealer "PROVINCIAL AUTOMOBILE CO. PVT. LTD" for the period from 01-Jan-2024 to 31-Mar-2024.
query: SELECT mh_ad_ai.[delr_name] AS [Dealer_Name], mh_cust_verbatim.[verbatim_group], mh_cust_verbatim.[verbatim_code], mh_cust_verbatim.[cust_verbtm_desc], mh_cust_verbatim.[verbatim_group_desc], mh_cust_verbatim.[demanded_verbatim], COUNT(mh_cust_verbatim.[verbatim_code]) AS [frequency_count] FROM MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS AS mh_ro JOIN MH_CUST_VERBATIM AS mh_cust_verbatim ON mh_ro.[sv_ro_hdr_sk] = mh_cust_verbatim.[sv_ro_hdr_sk] JOIN MH_AD_AI_DIMENSION AS mh_ad_ai ON mh_ro.[parnt_grop] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = mh_ad_ai.[parnt_grop] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND mh_ro.[loctn_cd] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = mh_ad_ai.[loctn_cd] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND mh_ro.[prodct_divsn] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = mh_ad_ai.[prodct_divsn] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS WHERE mh_ad_ai.[delr_name] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'PROVINCIAL AUTOMOBILE CO. PVT. LTD' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND mh_ro.[ro_bill_date] BETWEEN DATE '2024-01-01' AND DATE '2024-03-31' AND ((mh_ro.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('free service', 'paid service', 'en-route repair', 'repair') AND mh_ro.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'mechanical' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS) OR (mh_ro.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'bodyshop' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND mh_ro.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('accessories', 'bodyshop') COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS) OR (mh_ro.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'sales & service' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND mh_ro.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'accessories' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS) OR (mh_ro.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'bodyshop' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND mh_ro.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'pre-sale/pdi' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS)) AND mh_cust_verbatim.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%schedule%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND mh_cust_verbatim.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%washing%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND mh_cust_verbatim.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%maxicare%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND mh_cust_verbatim.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%wheel alignment%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND mh_cust_verbatim.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%wheel balance%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND mh_cust_verbatim.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%service action%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND mh_cust_verbatim.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%10000%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND mh_cust_verbatim.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%1000%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND mh_cust_verbatim.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%5000%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND mh_cust_verbatim.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%km%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS GROUP BY mh_ad_ai.[delr_name], mh_cust_verbatim.[verbatim_group], mh_cust_verbatim.[verbatim_code], mh_cust_verbatim.[cust_verbtm_desc], mh_cust_verbatim.[verbatim_group_desc], mh_cust_verbatim.[demanded_verbatim] ORDER BY [frequency_count] DESC;

input: Generate a Word Cloud for the Area Office "Calcutta" for the period from 01-Jan-2024 to 31-Mar-2024.
query: SELECT mm.[MODL_GROP_DESC] AS [Model_Grop], cv.[verbatim_group], cv.[verbatim_code], cv.[cust_verbtm_desc], cv.[verbatim_group_desc], cv.[demanded_verbatim], COUNT(cv.[verbatim_code]) AS [frequency_count] FROM MH_CUST_VERBATIM cv JOIN MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS rhd ON cv.[sv_ro_hdr_sk] = rhd.[sv_ro_hdr_sk] JOIN MH_MODEL_MASTER mm ON rhd.[MODL_CD] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = mm.[MODL_CD] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS JOIN MH_AD_AI_DIMENSION dim ON rhd.[PARNT_GROP] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = dim.[parnt_grop] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND rhd.[LOCTN_CD] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = dim.[loctn_cd] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND rhd.[PRODCT_DIVSN] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = dim.[prodct_divsn] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS WHERE dim.[area_name] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Calcutta' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND rhd.[RO_BILL_DATE] BETWEEN DATE '2024-01-01' AND DATE '2024-03-31' AND ((rhd.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('free service', 'paid service', 'en-route repair', 'repair') AND rhd.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'mechanical' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS) OR (rhd.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'bodyshop' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND rhd.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('accessories', 'bodyshop') COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS) OR (rhd.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'sales & service' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND rhd.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'accessories' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS) OR (rhd.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'bodyshop' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND rhd.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'pre-sale/pdi' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS)) AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%schedule%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%washing%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%maxicare%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%wheel alignment%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%wheel balance%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%service action%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%10000%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%1000%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%5000%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%km%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS GROUP BY mm.[MODL_GROP_DESC], cv.[verbatim_group], cv.[verbatim_code], cv.[cust_verbtm_desc], cv.[verbatim_group_desc], cv.[demanded_verbatim] ORDER BY [frequency_count] DESC;

input: Generate a Word Cloud for the "West Zone" covering the period from 01-Jan-2024 to 31-Mar-2024.
query: SELECT MH_AD_AI_DIMENSION.[zone_name] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AS [Dealer_Zone], MH_AD_AI_DIMENSION.[area_name] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AS [Dealer_AREA_Office], MH_CUST_VERBATIM.[verbatim_group], MH_CUST_VERBATIM.[verbatim_code], MH_CUST_VERBATIM.[cust_verbtm_desc], MH_CUST_VERBATIM.[verbatim_group_desc], MH_CUST_VERBATIM.[demanded_verbatim], COUNT(MH_CUST_VERBATIM.[verbatim_code]) AS [frequency_count] FROM MH_CUST_VERBATIM JOIN MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS ON MH_CUST_VERBATIM.[sv_ro_hdr_sk] = MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS.[sv_ro_hdr_sk] JOIN MH_AD_AI_DIMENSION ON MH_AD_AI_DIMENSION.[parnt_grop] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS.[parnt_grop] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND MH_AD_AI_DIMENSION.[loctn_cd] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS.[loctn_cd] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND MH_AD_AI_DIMENSION.[prodct_divsn] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS.[prodct_divsn] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS WHERE MH_AD_AI_DIMENSION.[zone_name] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'West Zone' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS.[RO_BILL_DATE] BETWEEN DATE '2024-01-01' AND DATE '2024-03-31' AND ((MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('free service', 'paid service', 'en-route repair', 'repair') AND MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'mechanical' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS) OR (MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'bodyshop' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('accessories', 'bodyshop') COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS) OR (MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'sales & service' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'accessories' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS) OR (MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS.[SERV_CATGRY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'bodyshop' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'pre-sale/pdi' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS)) AND MH_CUST_VERBATIM.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%schedule%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND MH_CUST_VERBATIM.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%washing%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND MH_CUST_VERBATIM.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%maxicare%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND MH_CUST_VERBATIM.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%wheel alignment%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND MH_CUST_VERBATIM.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%wheel balance%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND MH_CUST_VERBATIM.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%service action%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND MH_CUST_VERBATIM.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%10000%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND MH_CUST_VERBATIM.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%1000%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND MH_CUST_VERBATIM.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%5000%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS AND MH_CUST_VERBATIM.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%km%' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS GROUP BY [Dealer_Zone], [Dealer_AREA_Office], MH_CUST_VERBATIM.[verbatim_group], MH_CUST_VERBATIM.[verbatim_code], MH_CUST_VERBATIM.[cust_verbtm_desc], MH_CUST_VERBATIM.[verbatim_group_desc], MH_CUST_VERBATIM.[demanded_verbatim] ORDER BY [frequency_count] DESC;

input: List all parts used in a particular repair order RO25D000730
query: SELECT rp.[part_desc], rp.[part_code] FROM MH_RO_PARTS rp INNER JOIN MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS rohdr ON (rp.[SV_RO_HDR_SK] = rohdr.[SV_RO_HDR_SK]) WHERE rohdr.[ro_id] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'RO25D000730' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS;

input: List model descriptions and fuel types for all repair orders raised in 2024 with active models only.
query: SELECT mm.[MODL_DESC], mm.[FUEL_TYPE] FROM MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS rohdr INNER JOIN MH_MODEL_MASTER mm ON rohdr.[MODL_CD] = mm.[MODL_CD] WHERE rohdr.[RO_DATE] BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-12-31' AND mm.[ACTV_IND] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'y' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS;

input: List dealer names and locations for repair orders or ROs where the product division is 'PASSENGER VEHICLE'.
query: SELECT ad.[delr_name], ad.[loctn_name] FROM MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS rohdr INNER JOIN MH_AD_AI_DIMENSION ad ON rohdr.[LOCTN_CD] = ad.[loctn_cd] WHERE rohdr.[PRODCT_DIVSN] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'PASSENGER VEHICLE' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS;

input: Get all customer verbatim feedback and group descriptions for RO IDs that were canceled.
query: SELECT cv.[cust_verbtm_desc], cv.[verbatim_group_desc] FROM MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS rohdr INNER JOIN MH_CUST_VERBATIM cv ON rohdr.[SV_RO_HDR_SK] = cv.[sv_ro_hdr_sk] WHERE rohdr.[RO_STATS] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Cancelled' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS;

input: Get labour descriptions and total amounts for repair orders or ROs where labour hours exceed 4 and RO is not cancelled.
query: SELECT rl.[labr_desc], rl.[labr_totl_amnt] FROM MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS rohdr INNER JOIN MH_RO_LABOUR rl ON rohdr.[SV_RO_HDR_SK] = rl.[sv_ro_hdr_sk] WHERE rl.[labr_charg_hrs] > 4 AND rohdr.[RO_STATS] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS <> 'Cancelled' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS;

input: Show part descriptions and quantities for RO IDs where parts discount exceeded 200.
query: SELECT rp.[part_desc], rp.[part_quantity] FROM MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS rohdr INNER JOIN MH_RO_PARTS rp ON rohdr.[SV_RO_HDR_SK] = rp.[sv_ro_hdr_sk] WHERE rp.[part_discnt_amnt] > 200;

input: Give the total parts amount billed for RO RO25D000730
query: SELECT ROUND(SUM(TRY_CAST(rohdr.[PARTS_TOTL_AMNT] AS FLOAT)), 1) AS [Total_Parts_Amount_Billed] FROM MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS rohdr WHERE rohdr.[ro_id] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'RO25D000730' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS

input: Give the total Labour amount billed for RO RO25D000730
query: SELECT ROUND(SUM(TRY_CAST(rohdr.[LABR_TOTL_AMNT] AS FLOAT)), 1) AS [Total_Labour_Amount_Billed] FROM MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS rohdr WHERE rohdr.[ro_id] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'RO25D000730' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS

input: Give the total amount billed for RO RO25D000730
query: SELECT ROUND(SUM(TRY_CAST(rohdr.[PARTS_TOTL_AMNT] AS FLOAT)), 1) + ROUND(SUM(TRY_CAST(rohdr.[LABR_TOTL_AMNT] AS FLOAT)), 1) AS [Total_Amount_Billed] FROM MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS rohdr WHERE rohdr.[ro_id] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'RO25D000730' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS

input: Give all the ROs or Repair Orders where the vehicle is a TAXI
query: SELECT DISTINCT rohdr.[RO_ID] FROM MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS rohdr WHERE rohdr.[taxi_indicator] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Taxi' COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS

input: Select RO Cancel Date: Date when the repair order was cancelled, Spot Care Applied Flag: Indicates if spot care was applied to the repair order, Vehicle TOE Indicator: Indicates if the vehicle is classified as TOE, VIN: Vehicle Identification Number of the vehicle, RO Date: Date when the repair order was opened or created, RO DateTime: Timestamp for when the repair order was opened or created, Bill Date: Date when the repair order was billed, Bill DateTime: Timestamp for when the repair order was billed, RO Closed Date: Date when the repair order was closed, RO Status: Current status of the repair order, Odometer Reading: Odometer reading of the vehicle at the time of repair order creation, Service Appointment Header SK: Identifier for the associated service appointment, RO Bill Date: Date when the repair order bill was generated, Cancel Date: Date when the repair order was cancelled, Service RO Header SK: Primary key for MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS, Parent Group: Code or name for the parent group associated with the repair order, Location Code: References dealer/location in MH_AD_AI_DIMENSION, RO_ID: key column used to look a specific repair order, Parts Total Amount: Total amount billed for parts in the repair order, Labour Total Amount: Total amount billed for labor in the repair order, Document Amount: Total document amount for the repair order, Parts Basic Amount: Basic amount for parts before taxes and discounts, Labour Basic Amount: Basic amount for Labour before taxes and discounts, Service Advisor Employee Name: Name of the service advisor handling the repair order, Promised Delivery Date: Date promised for vehicle delivery to the customer, Revised Promised Delivery Date: Revised date promised for vehicle delivery, Revisit Indicator: Indicates if the repair order is a revisit, Model Code: Foreign key to MH_MODEL_MASTER, Service RO Bill Header SK: Identifier for the repair order bill header, Online Payment Flag: Indicates if the repair order was paid online, Segment Code: Code representing the segment of the vehicle for the repair order, Express Service Indicator: Indicates if the repair order was for express service, Chassis Number: Chassis number of the vehicle in the repair order, Key Account Segment: Key account segment classification for the repair order, Government Vehicle: Indicates if the vehicle is a government vehicle, Color Code: Code representing the color of the vehicle for the repair order, OEM Model Code: OEM-assigned model code for the vehicle in the repair order, Product Division: Product division associated with the repair order, Part Charge Amount: Amount charged for parts in the repair order, Labour Charge Amount: Amount charged for labour in the repair order, SDD Flag: Indicates if Same Day Delivery was applicable for the repair order, RO Greater Than 72 Hours: Indicates if repair order duration exceeded 72 hours, RO Less Than or Equal To 72 Hours: Indicates if repair order duration was 72 hours or less, RO Less Than or Equal To 48 Hours: Indicates if repair order duration was 48 hours or less, RO Less Than or Equal To 24 Hours: Indicates if repair order duration was 24 hours or less, RO Close Difference: Number of days or hours between expected and actual close of the repair order, TEA Flag: Special flag for TEA, CEA Flag: Special flag for CEA, MTRAQ Flag: Flag indicating MTRAQ status for the repair order, M1 M2 M3 M4: Consolidated field for multiple business-specific indicators, Key: General-purpose key or identifier for the repair order, RO Key: Specific key associated with the repair order, Key Employee: Employee key or identifier associated with the repair order, Key Bay: Bay key or identifier for the repair order, RO Day Closed: Number of days taken to close the repair order, Original Warranty Start Date: The date when the original warranty started for the vehicle, RSA Registration Status: Status of RSA registration for the repair order, Max TO Days from DOS: Maximum number of TO days from Date of Service, Arrived Date for Eligibility: Date when the vehicle arrived for eligibility assessment, RSA Registration Flag: Indicates if RSA registration is flagged for the repair order, RSA Expiry Date: Expiry date of the RSA for the vehicle, Eligible Vehicle Flag: Indicates if the vehicle is eligible for a particular service or benefit, Original Warranty Expiry Date: The date when the original warranty expires for the vehicle, Original Warranty Expiry KM: Odometer reading at which the original warranty expires for the vehicle, Warranty Flag: Indicates whether the repair order or vehicle is under warranty, Valid To: Date until which the repair order, warranty, or service is valid, Shield Validity Flag: Indicates whether the shield protection or coverage is currently valid, Scheme Expiry Date: Expiry date of any special scheme or offer associated with the repair order, Shield Registration Flag: Indicates whether the vehicle or repair order is registered for shield protection, MRP: Maximum Retail Price relevant to the repair order or parts, NDP: Net Dealer Price associated with the repair order or parts, Part Quantity: Quantity of parts used or billed in the repair order, Ageing Bucket: Numeric value indicating the ageing category or bucket for the repair order or parts, Brought By Name: Name of the person who brought the vehicle for service, Vehicle Brought By: Name or identifier of the person who brought the vehicle, Service Advisor Feedback Status: Status of feedback provided by the service advisor, Accessories Flag: Indicates if accessories were involved in the repair order, Division Key: Key or code for the division associated with the repair order, Registration Number: Vehicle registration number associated with the repair order, RO Remarks: Remarks or notes regarding the repair order, Bay Active Indicator: Indicates if the service bay was active for the repair order, Applied To: Indicates what the repair order or service was applied to, Warranty Ageing RO: Ageing value related to warranty for the repair order, Warranty Ageing Today: Ageing value for warranty as of today, Service Type Description: Description of the type of service performed in the repair order, Service Category Description: Description of the service category for the repair order, Model Color Key: Key representing the model and color combination for the vehicle, RO Source Name: Name of the source from which the repair order originated, Service Type Name: Name of the service type for the repair order, Repair Order Same Day Delay Reason: Reason for delay in same-day repair order completion, Estimation Variation Reason: Reason for variation in repair order cost or time estimation, Repair Order Cancel Reason: Reason for cancellation of the repair order, Repair Order Delay Reason: Reason for any delay in completion of the repair order, Pendency Reason: Reason for any pendency or hold on the repair order, Time Revision Approval Reason: Reason for approval of time revision in the repair order, Cost Revision Approval Reason: Reason for approval of cost revision in the repair order, Pickup Type Name: Name of the pickup type for the repair order or service, Drop Type Name: Name of the drop type for the repair order or service, RO Document Type Name: Name of the document type for the repair order, Bill Type Name: Name of the bill type for the repair order, Service Campaign Type Name: Name of the service campaign type for the repair order, Technician Employee Name: Name of the technician who performed the service, Product Division Name: Name of the product division associated with the repair order, Taxi Indicator: Indicates if the vehicle is classified as a taxi, Bay Type Name: Name or type of the service bay used for the repair order, Revisit Flag: Indicates if the repair order is a revisit, Repeat Repair Flag: Indicates if the repair order is for a repeat repair, Service Group: Group or category of the service performed in the repair order from MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS table

input: Select Service RO Header SK: Foreign key to MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS, Service RO Bill Header SK: Identifier for the service repair order bill header, Service RO Bill Labour Detail SK: Primary key for MH_RO_LABOUR, Standard Hours: Number of standard hours assigned for the labor task, Service Labour Master SK: Identifier for the service labor master record, Labour Description: Description of the labor task performed, Labour Tax: Tax amount applied to the labor task, Labour Amount: Amount charged for the labor task before discounts and taxes, Labour Rate: Rate per hour or per task for the labor performed, Labour Charged Hours: Number of hours charged for the labor task, Labour Discount Amount: Discount applied to the labor amount, Labour Total Amount: Total amount for labor after applying discounts and taxes, Total Bill Amount: Total bill amount for the labor record, Labour Billable Type Name: Name of the billable type for labor, Labour Type Name: Type or category of the labor performed, Labour Group Name: Group or classification of the labor task, Labour Code: Group or classification of the labor Group from MH_RO_LABOUR table
query: SELECT [sv_ro_hdr_sk], [sv_ro_bill_hdr_sk], [sv_ro_bill_labr_dtl_sk], [standrd_hrs], [sv_labr_mst_sk], [labr_desc], [labr_tax], [labrAmount], [labr_rate], [labr_charg_hrs], [labr_discnt_amnt], [labr_totl_amnt], [totalBillAmount], [labour_billable_type_name], [labour_type_name], [labour_group_name], [labr_code] FROM MH_RO_LABOUR

input: Select Service RO Header SK: Foreign key to MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS, Service RO Bill Header SK: Identifier for the service repair order bill header, Service RO Bill Part Detail SK: Primary key for MH_RO_PARTS, Part Code: Code identifying the part used in the repair order, Part Description: Description of the part used in the repair order, Part Quantity: Quantity of the part used in the repair order, Part Rate: Rate per unit for the part used, Part Amount: Amount charged for the part before discounts and taxes, Part Tax: Tax amount applied to the part, Part Discount Amount: Discount applied to the part amount, Part Total Amount: Total amount for the part after applying discounts and taxes, OEM Part Indicator: Indicates if the part is an OEM part or a local part, ABC Indicator: ABC classification indicator for the part, HML Indicator: HML classification indicator for the part, Landed Cost: Landed cost of the part, including all expenses, RIS Indicator: RIS classification indicator for the part, Purchase Price: Purchase price of the part, Selling Price: Selling price of the part, MRP: Maximum Retail Price of the part, HSN: Harmonized System Nomenclature code for the part, Net Dealer Price: Net price for the dealer after all adjustments, Discount Rate: Discount rate applied to the part, GNDP: Gross Net Dealer Price for the part, NDP: Net Dealer Price for the part, Bill Share: Share of the bill attributed to this part, Total Bill Amount: Total bill amount for the part record, Part Category Description: Description of the part's category, Part Billable Type Name: Name of the billable type for the part, Discount Type Name: Name of the discount type applied to the part, Product Division Name: Name of the product division for the part, Part Type Name: Type or category of the part used in the repair order, Part Category Group: Group or classification of the part's category, Common Part Category: Common category assigned to the part across multiple models or repairs, Category1: Additional categorization for the part as per business logic from MH_RO_PARTS table
query: SELECT [sv_ro_hdr_sk], [sv_ro_bill_hdr_sk], [sv_ro_bill_part_dtl_sk], [part_code], [part_desc], [part_quantity], [part_rate], [partAmount], [part_tax], [part_discnt_amnt], [part_totl_amnt], [oem_part_ind], [abc_ind], [hml_ind], [landed_cost], [ris_ind], [purchs_pric], [selng_pric], [mrp], [hsn], [net_delr_pric], [discnt_rate], [gndp], [ndp], [bill_share], [totalBillAmount], [part_category_description], [part_billable_type_name], [discount_type_name], [product_division_name], [part_type_name], [part_category_group], [common_part_category], [category1] FROM MH_RO_PARTS
